channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2024020343
item.description:
Report X-2024020343

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A tugger hit a pole and a hazmat package fell off the cart and started leaking. When the leak was discovered QA was called to pack the hazmat in a salvage drum and clean up the spill DescribePack: 1 of the lids came off when the hazmat hit the ground DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: When QA finished cleaning the spill the lid was screwed back on

item.title: Report X-2024020411
item.description:
Report X-2024020411

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-20
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unload found a wet hazmat when they opened a trailer door and called QA to come clean and take it away DescribePack: There is a small leak coming from the cap of the jerrican DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: When the leak was found the box was packed into a salvage drum

item.title: Report X-2024020465
item.description:
Report X-2024020465

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While setting up and scanning for the presort QA found a leaking hazmat on a van line and packed it into a salvage drum. DescribePack: there is a crack around the edge of the lid DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: When the crack was found the package was placed into a salvage drum
